name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 9
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Release Update - 9/22/2016
posts.description: Today's release contains some new features for routing, path parsing and the cli, along with various bug fixes in other places.

posts.name: Release Update - 9/13/2016
posts.description: This week we've pushed out several patch releases to polyfills, router and validation. You can read the full release notes below.

posts.name: Blue Spire Acquires Aurelia
posts.description: Today we're announcing that Blue Spire has acquired Aurelia from Durandal Inc. and that we're re-comitting ourselves to open source excellence.

posts.name: json-schema validation
posts.description: Like many of you, I have been keeping a close eye on the development of Aurelia's validation plugin(s) for some time now. This truly was the last missing piece of the puzzle for me in terms of being able to fully drop external JavaScript dependencies, and a notable gap in Aurelia's stable offering during the 1.0 release.

posts.name: Releases Notes Update - 9/7/2016
posts.description: As always, we're working hard to squash bugs and make various improvements to Aurelia. We've had a number of minor and patch releases over the last week. Below you can read the details of what's been included in those releases.

posts.name: Blog Address Change
posts.description: Currently our blog is located at blog.durandal.io. That's a bit odd considering all the content here is directly related to Aurelia. So, we'll be moving the blog to blog.aurelia.io this coming week. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. Thanks!

posts.name: Aurelia Validation Alpha 2
posts.description: We're excited to announce the release of aurelia-validation alpha 2! This release is a complete overhaul of the validation system.
